column4: I stumbled upon a cool guide that tells you how to hide a rar archive in a .jpg image on windows. I've been playing with the "cat" command to try to do the same
does anyone know a way to do this for linux?
- um, linux distros use MIME types and not file extensions... If you want to fool a person you can just rename it to name.jpg
- but anyone on ubuntu will get a warning message telling people what is wrong
